video.title: Zoo
video.synopsis: When animal species all over the world begin attacking humans, controversial zoologist Jackson Oz tries to discover the cause of the sudden change.

episodes.synopsis: Zoologist Jackson Oz and journalist Jamie Campbell investigate the first ominous attacks in what appears to be an animal revolt against humankind.
episodes.title: First Blood

episodes.synopsis: Jackson saves a friend held hostage by lions. Meanwhile, Jamie and Mitch uncover evidence of a lion hive mind and a possible pesticide connection.
episodes.title: Fight or Flight

episodes.synopsis: A bat attack causes Jackson and Abraham's plane to crash, Chloe investigates dog assaults, and Jamie and Mitch hit a wall with Sen. Vaughn.
episodes.title: The Silence of the Cicadas

episodes.synopsis: Mitch, Abraham and FBI agent Ben Shaffer investigate the wolf attacks at the Mississippi prison, and bats swarm an Antarctic research station.
episodes.title: Pack Mentality

episodes.synopsis: Mitch makes the connection between bacteria found in the wolf and Reiden. Meanwhile, a team in Rio fights bats that can attack in daylight.
episodes.title: Blame It on Leo

episodes.synopsis: Hartley seeks an optometrist's help in becoming like the affected animals, which leads to a life-or-death chase for the mother cell.
episodes.title: This Is What It Sounds Like

episodes.synopsis: Jamie searches Reiden's Paris offices for proof of their connection to Ben. Meanwhile, Mitch sees the mother cell in action on a captured bear.
episodes.title: Sleuths

episodes.synopsis: A container ship's crew is slaughtered by infected rats, which are unleashed on the mainland when the unmanned craft runs aground.
episodes.title: The Cheese Stands Alone

episodes.synopsis: Mitch tries to create an antidote to the mutations. Meanwhile, Burke attempts to retrieve the mother cell and the authorities pursue Chloe and Jamie.
episodes.title: Murmuration

episodes.synopsis: The team seeks an animal rights activist's help in fleeing on a plane to Zambia to gather the DNA of a leopard.
episodes.title: Emotional Contagion

episodes.synopsis: Things go from bad to worse when Jackson is hurt during the team's mission in Zambia and the hospital turns out to be overrun with mutated animals.
episodes.title: Eats, Shoots and Leaves

episodes.synopsis: While Jackson is undergoing surgery, Mitch and Jamie work with the leopard DNA and the mother cell to create a cure for the mutations.
episodes.title: Wild Things

episodes.synopsis: Months after the plane crash, the team struggles to find a cure, while the mutated animals wreak havoc on the streets of Washington.
episodes.title: That Great Big Hill of Hope

episodes.synopsis: The team rushes to find Jamie and the leopard. After the government initiates mandatory evacuations, the team flies to Patagonia on a special plane.
episodes.title: The Day of the Beast

episodes.synopsis: Jamie fends for herself in the wilderness. In Patagonia, Chloe and Jackson find a man with a new mutation. The team uncovers some strange deaths.
episodes.title: Caraquet

episodes.synopsis: Chloe's secretiveness is causing friction between her and Jackson. A team ally becomes a victim. Jamie encounters a man in the Canadian wilderness.
episodes.title: Collision Point

episodes.synopsis: In Vancouver, a building implosion creates chaos. The team crashes a formal event to get close to General Davies. Logan must confront his past.
episodes.title: The Walls of Jericho

episodes.synopsis: Chloe reveals Jamie's location before it's too late. Snakes become the focus of the latest threat. Jackson asks Dariela for an important favor.
episodes.title: The Moon and the Star

episodes.synopsis: An 1895 newspaper may hold important clues to what is happening now. In Lisbon, an ancient jellyfish is tested and a ghost gene is discovered.
episodes.title: Sex, Lies and Jellyfish

episodes.synopsis: Mitch explains the key to the triple helix mutation. Abe leads a team to a village in England where cicadas are creating a strange effect.
episodes.title: Jamie’s Got a Gun

episodes.synopsis: Abe and Jamie agree to keep Jackson in the dark about his father's role in the mutation. Jackson agrees to Davies' terms to find his mother.
episodes.title: Zero Sum

episodes.synopsis: Abe goes with Jackson to find his mother in Africa, but the price is very high. Mitch realizes he needs help from his father to find an extinct tiger.
episodes.title: Sins of the Father

episodes.synopsis: The team races to find Jackson before his mutation is complete. Jackson makes a deal with Davies. The Russians plan a vote on the Noah Objective.
episodes.title: The Yellow Brick Road

episodes.synopsis: Jackson returns, but his mutation is changing him. Robert makes a confession about the TX-14 gas. The team searches for the saber-toothed tiger.
episodes.title: The Contingency

episodes.synopsis: On the island of Pangea, the team looks for the saber-toothed tiger. The team races to release the DNA cure as the Noah Objective planes take off.
episodes.title: Pangaea

episodes.synopsis: After escaping a Pangea prison, the team learns the truth about the triple-helix animals. A sacrifice and a devastating revelation change everything.
episodes.title: Clementine

episodes.synopsis: Ten years after the animals were cured at the cost of sterilizing humanity, a new wave of mysterious attacks reunites Jackson with the team.
episodes.title: No Place Like Home

episodes.synopsis: A link emerges between far-flung hybrid attacks. Mitch meets a woman claiming to be his daughter. Abraham's sterility research becomes dangerous.
episodes.title: Diaspora

episodes.synopsis: Abe and Dariela consider drastic steps to protect their family, while Jamie and Clementine perform a high-risk surgical procedure on Mitch.
episodes.title: Ten Years Gone

episodes.synopsis: As the hybrids close in on New York, Abe and Dariela reunite with the team in an effort to discover what force is luring the creatures.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Terra Dome

episodes.synopsis: An incarcerated Jamie schemes to involve Mitch and Logan in hunting the mysterious Shepherds. Jackson reveals his family's fate to Tessa in Mexico.
episodes.title: Drop It Like It's Hot

episodes.synopsis: While Mitch tries to rescue Clementine from her captors, a glimpse into the past reveals the truth about Abigail's connection to the hybrids.
episodes.title: Oz is Oz

episodes.synopsis: The team attempts to save Abe and Dariela's son and other missing children. Mitch and Jamie cross paths with a familiar face from the past.
episodes.title: Wham, Bam, Thank You Sam

episodes.synopsis: To advance her secret agenda, Abigail takes Jackson hostage and interrogates him. The team's plane experiences a midair malfunction.
episodes.title: Stakes On a Plane

episodes.synopsis: After tracking Mitch to Copenhagen, the team encounters his alter ego, Mr. Duncan. Logan heads to Korea to investigate a hybrid nest.
episodes.title: The Black Forest

episodes.synopsis: With Abigail clinging to life, Jackson turns to Abe for help. Meanwhile, Jamie offers Mr. Duncan a deal.
episodes.title: Once Upon a Time in the Nest

episodes.synopsis: Toxic spores trap the team inside their plane. Clementine goes into labor but experiences complications.
episodes.title: Cradles and Graves

episodes.synopsis: When a sudden crisis leaves the team stranded in the hybrid zone, Tessa and Dariela mount a rescue mission.
episodes.title: West Side Story

episodes.synopsis: Jackson and the team race to shut down the last beacon as the hybrids attempt to breach the barrier wall. Abigail tries to get Clementine's baby.
episodes.title: The Barrier
